mapper.insert: insert into member(userid, userpwd, username, userphone, useremail, userzipcode, useraddr, userdetailaddr, birthday, joindate, usertype, userstop, point) values(#{userid}, #{userpwd}, #{username}, #{userphone}, #{useremail}, #{userzipcode}, #{useraddr}, #{userdetailaddr}, #{birthday}, sysdate, #{usertype}, 'N',0)
mapper.select: select count(userid) from member where userid = #{param1}
select userid, username, usertype, userstop from member where userid=#{param1} and userpwd=#{param2}
select userinfocontent from useinfo where userinfotitle = #{param1}
mapper.insert: insert into farm(storenum, farmname, farmintro, farmprofile, farmvisitor, productnum) values(farmsq.nextval, null, null, null, 0, null)

insert into seller(userid, storenum, storename, sellername, sellerreginum, sellerregiimg, regiapproval, regiapprovaldate, storezipcode, storeaddr, storedetailaddr, storeemail, bank, bankname, bankaccount) values(#{userid}, farmsq.currval, #{storename}, #{sellername}, #{sellerreginum}, #{sellerregiimg}, 0, null, #{storezipcode}, #{storeaddr}, #{storedetailaddr}, #{storeemail}, #{bank}, #{bankname}, #{bankaccount})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member m left join ordertbl o on o.userid = m.userid left join orderdetail t on t.ordernum = o.ordernum left join product p on p.userid = m.userid where (t.orderstatus in ('배송중', '배송완료') and m.userid=#{param1}) or (m.userid = #{param1} and p.sellfinish >= sysdate)
